article: his name is mysterious , his transformation from budding gang member to potential american olympic star is intoxicating and , as if that were n't enough , apolo anton ohno 's spectacular variety of teenage hairstyles is limited only by what may be stuffed snugly and safely under a utilitarian speed skating helmet .
